title: FiveThirtyEight - Wikipedia
snippet: ABC News announced that it would ... the 538 brand. After departing the site, Nate Silver began publishing a personal blog, Silver Bulletin. In May 2025, G. Elliott Morris announced a newsletter, Strength in Numbers, which he said he intends to expand into a successor to FiveThirtyEight...

title: FiveThirtyEight joins ABC News - ABC News
snippet: ABC News announced today it has reached an agreement in principle to acquire the renowned data journalism organization FiveThirtyEight from ESPN.

title: FiveThirtyEight 2025 Company Profile: Valuation, Investors, Acquisition | PitchBook
FiveThirtyEight - Crunchbase Company Profile & Funding
snippet: FiveThirtyEight maintains the innovative and entrepreneurial spirit of the original site Nate Silver founded in 2008. ... Get predictions on funding, acquisitions, IPOs and more.

title: Publishers Daily: ABC News Buys 'FiveThirtyEight'
snippet: FiveThirtyEight, which covers sports, politics and science, will continue to provide data-driven sports coverage to ESPN, which just sold it to ABC. The new ownership means FiveThirtyEight will expand its political coverage under ABC News.
